document.heading: District of Columbia Tissue Bank Act Amendment of 1980

history.narrative: Law 3-145, the “District of Columbia Tissue Bank Act Amendment of 1980,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-312. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 16, 1980, and September 30, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 14, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-266 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.

meta.search-text: COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA NOTICE D.C. Law 3-145 "District of Columbia Tissue Bank Act Amendment of 1980 Pursuant to Section 412 of the District of Columbia Self- Govecnment and Govecnmental Reocganization Act, P. L. 93-198 the Act the Council of the Distcict of Columbia adopted Bill No. 3-312 on ficst and second readings, September 16, 1980 and Septembec 30, 1980, respectively. Following the signature of the Mayor on October 14, 1980, this legislation was assigned Act No. 3-266, published in the October 24, 1980 ed i tion of the D.C. Register Vol. 27 page 4663 This act was originally transmitted to Congress on October 17, 1980, and resubmitted on J anuary 14, 1981 for a 30-day review, in accocdance with Section 602 (c)(l) of the Act. The Council of the District of Columbia hereby gives notice that the 30-day Congressional Review Period has expired, and therefore, cites this enactment as D.C.
